titles.title: For the relief of Mark A. Potts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E3040-3041)
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Law, Immigration, and Refugees.
Reported by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 103-577.

calendar.text: Placed on the Private Calendar, Calendar No. 6.

action.text: Called up from the Private Calendar for consideration.
By request of Mr. Sensenbrenner the House passed over the measure without prejudice.
Called up from the Private Calendar for consideration.
By request of Mr. Sensenbrenner the House passed over the measure without prejudice.

bill.summary: 11/22/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the classification of a named individual as a child within the meaning of the Immigration and Nationality Act.
